Title: The Giant Killer
Plot: When Gabrielle defends a young Isrealite named David, her life is threatended until Xena proposes to fight her old friend, the giant Goliath in return for freedom for the Philistines.
GuestStars: Todd Rippon, Anthony Starr, Calvin Tuteao, Dale Corlett, Emma Brunette, Brad Homan, John Leonard, Antony Starr
